name: S. Spring Breeze (Green)
description:
New Type of Birthday Cake Topper Letters: 
This is a handmade custom-order for birthday cake-topper letters. Calligraphy and decorating topper letters may be changed depending on the number of letters and name.  

This item is for all of you who are planning a creative, special, or unforgettable birthday party. Enjoy your party with your own name on a cake. You will experience a unique birthday, celebration, or party.  We guarantee having your own name in topper letters will make you and your party feel more special and exciting. It will be the best gift for someone you care about.
Here is an example:
10 colors are available. Choose your favorite colors.
  
•	A Guard of the Pole Star: Gold 
•	Moonlight:  Silver
•	A Knight & a Star:  Black  
•	Never Ending Passion:  Red
•	A Love Sketch:  Pink
•	Spring Breeze:  Green
•	Fog & a Poem:  Light Purple
•	Magical Haze:  Purple
•	Paradise Beach:  Aqua Blue
•	Summer Island:  Blue

Materials: 1.5mm Aluminum Wire for small size and 2 mm Aluminum for Large Size.  Decoration:  quality glass beads, Swarovski beads, bow, and ribbon.  
Height:  Most items are made about 7 inches with 1.5 mm and 2 mm Aluminum wire.  

First letter in small size is about 1 1/2 - 2 inches and each small letters 1/2 - 1 inch.  First letter in large size is about 2-3 inches and each small letter is about 1 - 1 1/2 inch.  

All initial is about 2-3 inches and 2 mm wire is used.  
After using it you can store it safely and reuse it next year.
 
Length:   Differs due to the number of characters in the name. 

NOTE: When checking out the item through PayPal, please type the NAME or INITIAL you wish to use in the "Notes to Seller" message field box.

Please choose the color below:

options.name: A Guard of the Pole Star (Gold)
